Nightstrike

Nightstrike waited Swichblade and ignored Cepta.



----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Fri=
day, April 27, 2001 11:17 PM
  Subject: Re: Cepta, meet Squawktalk...


  -=
--Switchblade---

  Switchblade enters the main room followed by Nightstrik=
e. He sees 
  Squawktalk and half frowns, "Squawktalk, get out of the way, =
I've 
  got important business to attend to." He motions for Nightstrike to=
 
  follow. Then he sees Cepta for the first time. "Hmmm, new parts, 
  who=
're you?" his eyes narrow and flash green then return to normal 



  On 27=
 Apr 2001, at 21:58, Soulstice Omega wrote:

  > Squawktalk, listening to M=
egatron, flies to Cepta.
  > 
  > Squawktalk: Hello, hello, you want the to=
ur, right? Of course you do! Okay! Anyway, first of all, this is the main c=
hamber, it serves well because it's main. It's where you are when you first=
 walk in, it's where you are when you see the door! It's where we go someti=
me to leave the base, it's 
  also where we go after we come in! It's got a=
ll these cool computers and stuff, and tables and that and it's where we ar=
e right now! Isn't that a coincidence? Well, anyway, it's a nice room maybe=
 a little too dusty but then again maybe not and it's a good room because i=
t has lots of room, and it 
  leads into all of the other rooms, it's also =
one of the biggest rooms, which is good, because everyone might try to come=
 in at the same time, and if they do and the room is really tiny then every=
one will be crowded and the base might explode. Also, it's big because some=
thing might happen like 
  someone breaks in, and there might be a shootout=
 and everyone will get shot if there isn't much room, did I mention that? I=
 don't think I did, correct me if I'm wrong, but I know I'm not wrong becau=
se I'm right. Anyway, I'm Squawktalk and you are? I mean what's your name, =
I'm not calling you 
  Squawktalk, that would be silly, wouldn't it? I hope=
 you have a nice name, you probably do, but I still hope, because hoping ca=
n get you stuff sometimes, and anyway, it's fun, so about your name, it sho=
uld be nice because my name is cool and I met you, didn't I? Anyhow, what I=
 was trying to say 
  is that maybe we've spent too long in this room, want=
 to go to the next room? It would be good because then we won't be in this =
room and we'll be in the next one instead and I can talk to you in there ju=
st hurry up and don't take forever, okay?...
  >
